Header: Tree planting mission to make Colombo a green city
Content: Colombo Mayor Rosy Senanayake says 100,000 saplings will be planted before the end of this year in the mission to make Colombo a green city. Rosy Senanayake was speaking at a tree planting ceremony held in Colombo. The event has been organized to mark the World Environment Day that falls, tomorrow.Â  Addressing the gathering the Mayor highlighted that the government will take strong action against terrorism. She also highlighted that no group of innocent people will be discriminated under the guise of terrorism. She stated that hatred being spread by social media would never serve for good purposes.
